pr_title: Pull in EL API & IMPL From Tomcat 10.0.0-M7

timeline.message: Create Overlay in EL API & IMPL with Tomcat 10.0.0-M7 ; Update one  EL22OperatorsServlet.java test

timeline.bodyText:
Shouldn't we be pulling in the Jakarta API?
https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/jakarta/el/jakarta.el-api/4.0.0-RC2/
timeline.author: tevans78

replies.bodyText:
Although both use the same EL 4.0 spec, there are a few differences in the API code.
The major issue is when testing the jakarta.el API with the Tomcat Jasper EL Impl under java 2 security, we receive a number of security warnings. I believe those should be addressed in the API code? The security manger does not throw the same warnings under the Tomcat API.  I opened an issue in the Eclipse EL Community for further feedback: eclipse-ee4j/el-ri#131
replies.author: volosied

replies.bodyText:
There is also an NPE thrown in app used for testJSP23ResolutionVariableProperties.
Otherwise,  I think it's best to use the Tomcat API for now and switch later on if preferred.
replies.author: volosied
